name: The Void Experiment
description:
(Game is currently very broken)

After a horrific accident, the only one left alive in the research facility is a lone Janitor. 

A strange substance has started growing out of the walls and floors. You can feel can its eyes watching you always. 

Your only goal is to leave this godforsaken facility. But that may not be as easy as you'd hoped, because it appears you're not as alone as you thought you were. 

[Team]

Ectho - Programming and Art

Alios - Sound and Music

Voladous - Level and Environment Design

Smuli - Programming and Animation

Ylivoima - Art

SundayRoast - Animation
